Description: Rough straw-tempered Nile silt pottery bowl with flat base, splayed sides, and roll rim; interior blackened. Base is not level. Coarsely made.
Curator's comments: Illustrated in W.M.F Petrie and A.C. Mace, Diospolis Parva, London (1901), pl. xvii.33; Rough ware R33a in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
